channel.title: Rust on Hackerman's Hacking Tutorials
channel.description: Recent content in Rust on Hackerman's Hacking Tutorials

item.title: YAML Wrangling with Rust
item.description: I will talk about how I parsed Semgrep rules in YAML with Rust, how I created Rust structs from JSON schemas for Semgrep rules, and finally, what didn't work. This blog post has different sections with code so you can follow and experiment.
